Notes.Text:
This update for nvidia-open-driver-G06-signed fixes the following issues:

- Update to 550.144.03 (bsc#1235461, bsc#1235871)
  * fixes CVE-2024-0131, CVE-2024-0147, CVE-2024-0149,
    CVE-2024-0150, CVE-2024-53869
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: NVIDIA GPU kernel driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability where a potential user-mode attacker could read   a buffer with an incorrect length. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to denial of service.
